    com.samskivert.servlet.util

      static Date ParameterUtil.getDateParameter(HttpServletRequest req, String name, String invalidDataMessage)

      Fetches all the values from the request with the specified name and converts them to an IntSet.

      Fetches the supplied parameter from the request and converts it to a long.

      Similar to ParameterUtil.getDateParameter(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) but returns a SQL date.

      Fetches the supplied parameter from the request.
